entity.name: entity1
entity.body:
<a-entity light="intensity: 0.8; type: ambient" position="0 -1 2"></a-entity>
<a-entity light="intensity: 0.2; castShadow: true" position="0 -1 2"></a-entity>

<a-entity rotation="0 95 15">
<a-box position="0 {{{{height}}/2}} 0" rotation="0 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="{{{{width}}}} {{{{thickness}}/10}} {{height}}"></a-box>
<a-box position="0 {{-{{height}}/2}} 0" rotation="0 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="{{{{width}}}} {{{{thickness}}/10}} {{height}}"></a-box>
<a-box position="0 0 {{-{{height}}/2}}" rotation="90 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="{{{{width}}}} {{{{thickness}}/10}} {{height}}"></a-box>
<a-box position="0 0 {{{{height}}/2}}" rotation="90 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="{{{{width}}}} {{{{thickness}}/10}} {{height}}"></a-box>
</a-entity>

<a-entity camera="active: true" position="0 2 15" wasd-controls="" rotation="" look-controls="enabled: true" aframe-injected="" data-aframe-inspector-original-camera="" visible=""></a-entity>
entity.title: Title important stuff 7e/m3
entity.processedBody:
<a-entity light="intensity: 0.8; type: ambient" position="0 -1 2"></a-entity>
<a-entity light="intensity: 0.2; castShadow: true" position="0 -1 2"></a-entity>

<a-entity rotation="0 95 15">
<a-box position="0 2 0" rotation="0 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="8 0.4 4"></a-box>
<a-box position="0 -2 0" rotation="0 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="8 0.4 4"></a-box>
<a-box position="0 0 -2" rotation="90 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="8 0.4 4"></a-box>
<a-box position="0 0 2" rotation="90 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" scale="8 0.4 4"></a-box>
</a-entity>

<a-entity camera="active: true" position="0 2 15" wasd-controls="" rotation="" look-controls="enabled: true" aframe-injected="" data-aframe-inspector-original-camera="" visible=""></a-entity>

entity.name: entity3
entity.body:
<a-box position="0 0.5 -7" rotation="0 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" shadow="" material="" geometry="" scale="{{width}} 1 1"></a-box>
<a-entity light="intensity: 0.96; castShadow: true" position="0 4 2"></a-entity>
entity.title: Title important stuff
entity.processedBody:
<a-box position="0 0.5 -7" rotation="0 0 0" color="#CCCCCC" shadow="" material="" geometry="" scale="5 1 1"></a-box>
<a-entity light="intensity: 0.96; castShadow: true" position="0 4 2"></a-entity>

entity.name: entity1
entity.body:
<a-text position="-1 0.5 -3" color="#4CC3D9" value="Hello, test!"></a-text>
<a-sphere position="0 1.25 -5" radius="0.25" color="#EF2D5E"></a-sphere>
<a-sky color="#ECECEC"></a-sky>
